name: UFO Simulator Control Master
description:
​



UFO Simulator Control Master is a physics based arcade/simulation game.

The goal of this game is to abduct rescue missing astronauts by controlling a UFO in space. Get through the narrow passes, dodge the various traps with delicate control. And evacuate astronauts to the goal Area 51? within the time limit.

Features
  • You can explore the mystery and danger of space.
  • There are two main play modes, including Arcade stages (2.5D style) and Simulation stages (3D style).
  • The game uses a check point system so you will not lose your progress.
  • Realistic UFO flight physics.



This is Steam Greenlight (Greenlit) game. Thanks for all the supports!
